\chead{Midterm \ --- Problem \ProblemNumber}

\cfoot{\thepage}
\rfoot{Spring 2018}

\newtheorem{definition}{Definition}
\newtheorem{theorem}{Theorem}
\newtheorem{lemma}{Lemma}
\newtheorem{observation}{Observation}
\newtheorem{question}{Question}
